gurmukhi: krXo nwQ XoN Awp nwrM auDwrM ]qiRXw rwj biRMdw sqI s`q twrM ]21]
transliteration: Daryo Naath Yon Aap Naaran Udhaaran|| Triyaa Raaj Brindaa Satisatt Taafan||21||
translation: Vishnu manifested himself in this form in order to protect his wife, and in this way, he defiled the chastity of the extremely chaste Varinda.21.

gurmukhi: qjXo dyih dYqM BeI ibsn nwrM ]DrXo duAwdsmo ibsn deIqwvqwrM ]
transliteration: Tajyo Deh(i) Daitan Bhaibisan Naaran|| Ddaryo Duaa-dasmo Bisan Daeetaavtaaran||
translation: Abandoning the body of demoness, Varinda again manifested herself as Lakshmi, the wife of Vishnu and in this way Vishnu assumed the twelfth incarnation in the form of a demon.

gurmukhi: punr ju`Du s`jXo ghy ssqR pwxM ]igry BUm mo sUr soBy ibmwxM ]22]
transliteration: Pounar Juddh(u) Sajjyo Gade Sastra Paanan|| Gire Bhoom Mo Soor Sobhe Bimaanan||22||
translation: The war continued again and the warriors held their weapons in their hands; the brave fighters began to fall in the battlefield and also the air-vehicles came down in order to take away the dead warriors from the battlefield.22.

gurmukhi: imtXo siq nwrM ktXo sYn srbM ]imtXo BUp jwlMDrM dyh grbM ]
transliteration: Mityo Sat(i) Naaran Katyo Sain Saraban|| Mityo Bhoop Jaalandharan Deh Gadaban||
translation: On this side, the chastity of woman was defiled and on that side all the army was chopped. By this the pride of Jalandhar was shattered.

gurmukhi: punr ju`Du sjXo hTy qyj hIxM ]Bjy Cwf kY sMg swQI ADIxM ]23]
transliteration: Pounar Juddh(u) Sajyo Hathe Tej Heenan|| Bhaje Chhaad Kai San Saathiadheenan||23||
translation: But still weak king continued the fight and all his companions and subordinates ran away from the battlefield.2.

gurmukhi: duhUM ju`Du kInw rx mwhI ]qIsr Avru qhwN ko nwhI ]
transliteration: Duhoon Juddh(u) Keedaa Ran Maahee|| Teesar Avar(u) Tahaan Ko Naahee||
translation: Both Shiva and Jalandhar fought and there was none other in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: kyqk mws mcXo qh ju`Dw ]jwlMDr huAY isv pr kRu`Dw ]24]
transliteration: Ketak Maas Machyo Tah Juddhaa|| Jaalandhar Huai Siv Par Kruddhaa||24||
translation: The war continued of several month and Jalndhar was filled with great fury for (the action of ) Shiva.24.

gurmukhi: qb isv iDAwn skq kO Drw ]qw qy skq kiRpw kh krw ]
transliteration: Tab Siv Dhiaan Sakat Kau Dharaa|| Taa Te Sakat Kridaa Kah Karaa||
translation: Then Shiva meditated upon the Shakti (power) and the Power (Shakti) was Gracious towards him.

gurmukhi: qw qy BXo rudR blvwnw ]mMfXo ju`Du bhuir ibiD nwnw ]25]
transliteration: Taa Te Bhayo Rudra Balvaanaa|| Mandyo Juddh(u) Bahur(i) Bidh(i) Naanaa||25||
translation: Now, Rudra getting mightier than before began to wage wr.25.

gurmukhi: auq hir lXo nwir irp sq hir ]ieq isv BXo qyj dybI kir ]
transliteration: Out Har(i) Layo Daar(i) Rip Sat Har(i)|| It Siv Bhayo Tej Debikar(i)||
translation: On that side, Vishnu had defiled the chastity of woman, and on this side, Shiva also, having received the effulgence form the goddess, became more powerful.

gurmukhi: iCn mo kIXo Asur ko nwsw ]inrK rIJ Bt rhy qmwsw ]26]
transliteration: Chhin Mo Keeyo Asur Ko Naasaa|| Japoh Channdakaa To Sabh Jaamaa||26
translation: Therefore he destroyed the demon Jalandhar in and instant; seeing this scene, all were pleased.26.

gurmukhi: jwlMDrI qw idn qy nwmw ]jphu cMfkw qo sB jwmw ]
transliteration: Jaalandharitaa Din Te Naamaam|| Japoh Channdakaa To Sabh Jaamaa||
translation: Those who repeat the Name of Chandika, they know that from that day, Chnadika came to be known as Jalandhari.
